price: Isipo kuwa Iblisi; alijivuna na akawa katika makafiri.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: Malaika wote wakafanya kama walivyo amrishwa, wakamuangukia wakisujudu, isipo kuwa Iblisi. Yeye hakusujudu, na akajiona bora na akapanda kiburi, na akawa miongoni mwa makafiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
